actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants to the Massachusetts Water Resources Authority for construction of wastewater treatment.
short_title: Boston Harbor Wastewater Treatment Act of 1993
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Boston Harbor Wastewater Treatment Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants to the Massachusetts Water Resources Authority for constructing wastewater treatment works for areas served by the Authority. Limits the Federal share of such grants to 75 percent of construction costs. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Boston Harbor Wastewater Treatment Act of 1993

A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants to the Massachusetts Water Resources Authority for construction of wastewater treatment.
